posts.body: allah is to be the one to be workshipped,he is ever living, somber or sleep dest get him, whatever is in land sky its his, without his permission no one can precede.

posts.title: my 10th post
posts.body:
all praise be to allah the creation and manager of the world,unlimitedly loving and caring.king of the day of judgement.
we are praying to you, asking help from you.so show us the straight path.it is the path of those who are blessed by you not have your anger on them. 
ALHAMDULIILLAH
